summary: Selene Kate will stop telling you that you're disgusting.
descriptionHtml: If you have Selene Kate companion and she keeps telling you that you're disgusting, you can use this fix to correct. It's a simple sound file replacement, just drop into your data folder. It replaces the line "you're disgusting" with "I'm walking around naked", which is a more appropriate line since it gets triggered when she thinks she's underdressed. There are no scripts or esps, so it will not interfere with the main mod or anything else. Just a simple file swap.
author: Jbak
